name: Beach anime day
description:
Beach anime day– a game that is a puzzle. The task of the game is to add up and get a whole picture, from the pieces into which it is cut. If the parts are selected correctly, they are automatically glued together. As soon as all the pieces are combined into a single picture, it will come to life and will delight you with its animation.
Beach anime day will test your thinking and desire to see what is originally scattered on the surface. Like any board game, puzzles have a relaxing effect, because in order to assemble a picture, you need to show a little logical ability and patience.
Features:
Original pixel art.
Three types of difficulty
Relaxing music
